name: CUBE 332
description: CUBE 332 - fascinating runer. In which, you need to get from point A to point B, using only the mouse and one button. Simple, is not it?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 GHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 25 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound
